manual_url.title: Authentication Server URL
manual_url.description:
No local authentication source was detected. Please enter the URL of your Family Link Auth container.

Example: `http://192.168.1.100:8099` or `http://familylink-auth:8099`

data_description.enable_location_tracking: ⚠️ When enabled, each location poll may send a notification to the child's device. Disabled by default for privacy.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to authentication server. Please verify the URL and ensure the container is running.
error.invalid_auth: No cookies found. Please authenticate first using the Family Link Auth add-on or container.
error.no_cookies: Server is reachable but no cookies found. Please authenticate first via the web interface.
